title: GEMELLI WITH ROASTED GARLIC AND CAULIFLOWER
directions: Heat oven to 500°. Toss 1⁄4 cup oil, cumin, garlic, cauliflower, and salt and pepper on a baking sheet; spread out evenly. Bake until cauliflower is golden brown and tender, 25–30 minutes.
Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta until al dente, about 13 minutes. Drain and set aside.
Toss cauliflower mixture with remaining oil, pasta, almonds, raisins, parsley, lemon juice and zest. Season with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve topped with bread crumbs.
ingredients: 1 medium head cauliflower, cored and cut into 1” florets
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
